segments.text: And lots of Dear Abby sob stories ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey ! I learn a lot from the psychologists who give advice in those columns !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder you're such a wacko ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice . Hey , I like the layout of this page ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean , you like the pictures of the beautiful models ... Hello ?
segments.speaker: S2
